description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nScared Stiff:
After an enemy is afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SNARED} or {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FEAR}, this creature afflicts them with whichever of these debuffs the target doesn't already have.
name: Cursed Cobweb
